chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 has a problem. Hello The SIM card support doesn't turn on fully, it's a bit scratched, I just got it yesterday. Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile

The customer has informed us that the SIM card holder does not engage fully and is a little scratched.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Mirana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Can you relay the message to the customer that we are so sorry that they are unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 30 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.

Regards,
CH

Hello Elie, You will find the prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that best suits you to send back your package. You'll find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/ Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an item at this link 2. Add all the accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protective coverings, screen protectors, and other protection 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packing the item: • The box must be solid and rigid. Place your item so it's stable and doesn't move during transport. • Attach the return label to the top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the package's interior and exterior before sending it. This will protect you in case there's a problem during transit. Your return is ready to ship! We'll let you know when it arrives. We're at your disposal, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Dear ecomobile,

I take the liberty of contacting you to inform you that the customer has returned their item for replacement.

So please do what is necessary after receiving the product, please.

Regards,
Loriane from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of your message and await the arrival of the product.

Regards,
JH

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
L’article est verrouillé sur iCloud ou Google.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the necessary actions. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Any updates?

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile,

We have not received a response from the client yet.

Regards,
Loriane from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

The customer’s account has been disconnected.

Regards,
Loriane from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you for your assistance. 

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately,  we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. We have processed a full refund for the customer instead. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
SY
